greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Sum of the divisors of n which are not divisible by 7.
reference: B. C. Berndt, Ramanujan's Notebooks Part III, Springer-Verlag, see p. 467, Entry 5(i).
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: a(n) is multiplicative and a(p^e) = 1, if p=7, a(p^e) = (p^(e+1)-1)/(p-1) otherwise.
L.g.f.: log(Product_{k>=1} (1 - x^(7*k))/(1 - x^k)) = Sum_{n>=1} a(n)*x^n/n. - _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Mar 14 2018
mathematica: f[p_, e_] := If[p == 7, 1, (p^(e+1)-1)/(p-1)]; a[1] = 1; a[n_] := Times @@ f @@@ FactorInteger[n]; Array[a, 100] (* _Amiram Eldar_, Sep 17 2020 *)
results.author: _Michael Somos_, Nov 10 2005
